help.info: Lower bound on the increment of a signal
help.descr: This filter introduces the lower bound \text{lb} on the difference of a signal \text{lb} \le \Delta s_{k} . The signal difference is defined as \Delta s_{k} = s_{k} - s_{k-1} where s is the system signal and k is the time instant. The filter is activated by calling s.with('deltaMin').
